Name: Permitting food vending and general vending on certain streets.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to permitting food vending and general vending on certain streets
BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Re-referred to Committee by Council to the Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

History.Description: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

History.Description: This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Attachments.Name: March 28, 2019 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - March 28, 2019

Summary: This bill would permit street vending in certain specified areas in the Financial District.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Subdivision k of section 17-315 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new paragraph 3 to read as follows:
      3. A food vendor may vend on specified portions of the following streets, provided that such food vendor complies with all applicable laws and rules:
      (a) The easterly side of Broadway between Exchange Place and Beaver Street.
      � 2. Subdivision g of section 20-465 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new paragraph (5) to read as follows:
      (5) A general vendor may vend on specified portions of the following streets, provided that such general vendor complies with all applicable laws and rules:
      (a) The easterly side of Broadway between Exchange Place and Beaver Street.
      � 3. This local law takes effect 60 days after it becomes law.

NAB
LS #9363
3/27/19
      
      
      1
      
      
      2
